messages.msgSnippet: Thank you to everybody who sent me soap info.  It was all very helpful.  Unfortunately, lye is illegal here...  ...  ... I don t have time to join a soap list
messages.messageBody:
Thank you to everybody who sent me soap info. It was all very
helpful. Unfortunately, lye is illegal here... ... ...

I don't have time to join a soap list - I don*t even have time to
read
all the messages on this list. I just read what looks interesting on
the web.

BTW, does anyone know why I have ads attached to the messages I send
out? Does onelist automatically do that? Or hotmail? Or do I have
a
computer virus???

Thanks

Melanie in Japan
AOL IM: vouget
MSN messenger: vouget
Yahoo IM: vouget
